name: FireBot
description: The first deflationary telegram bot Experience seamless and lightning-fast trading on the go with our free-to-use Telegram bot. All in one telegram bot Trade , Snipe , copy wallets and we're proud to be the first bot to provide volume bot option for projects who want to use our bot making their own Market Making. We got Fire. We are FireBot. The project had a Fair Launch, which means that 100% of the token supply was added to liquidity at launch. 1M tokens. Fully circulating and non-dilutive. 5% tax on FIREBOT traded as follows: 1% LP | 2% burn| 2% marketing and operating expenses. 40% of bot transaction fees to holders. Be a holder of 100 FIREBOT tokens or more to be entitled to revenue share & discounts using the bot. What can FireBot do ? Trade / Snipe Our trading bot has a comprehensive suite of features designed to help you win. All free-to-use. Limit Orders : Buy low, sell high. Execute your strategy with precision. Copy Wallets Find the most profitable wallets on chain and put the FireBot at work : Trade like the pros, replicate their wins. Market Making FireBot is the first bot to provide an option for crypto project to manage their own Market Making. 0.1% Transaction fee for each transaction wich 40% are distributed for revenue share with holders. Benefits for holders Holding 100 FIREBOT tokens or more entitles you to a number of benefits: - 20% reduction on fees for swaps made through FireBot . - Entitles you to revenue sharing. - Access to our private alpha community
